layout.name: turns
layout.title: Turns Around
layout.tooltip: Does the NPC turn around after every jump? (Creates a back-forth movement)

layout.name: useFixed
layout.title: Fixed Mode
layout.tooltip: If this flag is set, the NPC should be placed above its rest position. It will then use its Jump Height value to determine how high to jump, rather than the distance it fell.

layout.name: jumpHeight
layout.title: Jump Height
layout.tooltip: If using Fixed Mode, determines how high it should jump.
